name: Fenrir Quest Demo
description:
Hi Gamers,

This is a demo for a game I am making. I appreciate all feedback, bugs, etc! The gameplay is about 3-4 hours long just unzip and open the game file! 

Thank you for everyone playing!

The story if you are interested:

You play as Fenrir on the island of Midrealm. Your best friends are Aphrodite and Amaterasu, you all go to school together. Everything is fine until Aphrodite disappeared to the hands of Eros. You are on a Quest at first to save her but this becomes a quest of Revenge. You against the Gods.
